name: Slimes VS Rabbits
description:
You are a slime who absorbed a regular carrot.  The rabbits dont like when random people steal their carrots and now they are angry.

The rabbits wants to grab the carrot inside you. To do that, they will kill you if they have to! 

Defend yourself using your own life to spawn slime towers and slime traps.

Becareful with the earthquakes, they destroy your towers.

Controls: 
- Arrows/WASD to move
- 1/2/3/4 to build slime towers and slime traps
- R to remove buildings

This game was made by LittleLeoGames and LunicGames in 28hours for a custom GameJam.  Jams Theme: "You are the energy source".
